availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Thomas Moore (Curator of Kentucky Univ)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, minister, educator, and university curator. Kentucky native. Married Mary A. Bishop Moore in June 1864. Attended school and taught at an academy in Newcastle, Kentucky. Graduated from Bethany College in Virginia in July 1858. Minister of the Church of Christ in Frankfort, Kentucky, from October 1858 to 1864. Minister of Church of Christ in Detroit, Michigan, from January 1, 1865, to February 1866. Member of the board of curators of Kentucky University in 1865.
